tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I came across Dr.Sanjeeva Reddy quite accidentally. My 13-day old son was suffering from Jaundice and his regular paediatrician was out of town. Someone suggested Dr.Sanjeeva Reddy(thank god for that!).
He diagnosed accurately and had my son admitted immediately. With personal interest and dedication, he cured my son soon. After that I never went back to my son's regular paediatrician. I find him warm, approachable and very committed.My son is now a 5 year old. In these 5 years, several times when he has suffered from cold, cough, fever, stomach problems, I just had to pick the phone and call this doctor. Every time he has received the calls and guided me.Never once has he ignored my call. Tell me, how many doctors will do that in this busy world that we are living in. I would absolutely recommend him to all!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is the pediatric for our new born. we have visited him routine check ups for the baby and vaccination almost every month. Being new parents, we have had lot of queries and concerns (sometimes the queries which our elders think is not even a point to talk) but I have always found him answering us with a smile along with a logical explanation. he always vaccinated our baby himself and not ask the nurse to do it, which I find as a great advantage. he observation skills are highly proficient with regards to the baby milestones achievement. surely, if not for him, we as parents would have been lost seeing so many new things in our first baby.

Had a very good experience with the doctor.. who patiently listened and answered all our queries.. doesn't recommend too many medicines and believes in natural healing... gives practical solution to problems and isn't stubborn like doctors at Cloudnine OAR (where we had the delivery mainly because we wanted to do it under Praveena Shenoi only).. the doctor is easily available and it was a great respite for us as we wanted a good doctor whom we can as and when required without taking half a day off from office

** ******** ** *** **** *** ****** **** * *****  My daughter admitted to Manipal hospital where this doctor was taking care. ***** * **** ** ********* *** **** ** **** **** ***** ** *****. He did 30 different type of tests and Finally advised for bone marrow testing .

They changed 3.2 laks but fevers has not come down so I taken discharge. Gone to different hospital.

This doctor only takeing money from people. Do not have any humanity.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Sanjeeva Reddy has been my child's doctor since he was born and now for more than 5 years. He is very systematic with his approach, will provide meds, tests only when required.The treatment is always to the point and we never faced any difficulties.He explains the condition and diasgnosis very well.I am blessed to have a doctor like him for my child. He even picks up the call and provides meds whenever i have called in emergency if out of town or on Sundays.I would highly recommend him.
I have been consulting the doctor for almost 5 years for my kids. He is very quick in understanding the cause and does not prescribe unnecessary medicines.

Doctor patiently heard our concerns and spent a good deal of time with us. He is very calm and well spoken.
However, our experience at the hospital was not very good as we were made to wait for more than an hour after our appointment time.
By birth onwards my baby we are going to dr. Sanjeeva reddy . Every time I am feeling like my kid is in safe hand .

Dr Sanjeev Reddy is very good  pediatrician . His treatment and advices are highly commendable & very much helpful .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My daughter had fever, cold and cough. Doctor heard us peacefully first then gave us confidence that it could be 90% viral fever and not to worry even if fever doesn't go immediately. Same as said fever didn't go but step by step approach treating was appreciable. Initially he prescribed calpol tonic and next time antibiotic.Antibiotic cleared fever in a day and my baby is recovered.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First of all he wont give unncessary medicine for the baby. He exactly gives the solution and remedy..May his medicine may take time to cure *** ** ** *** **** *** ** **** *** **** ****** ******* *** ********* *********** He is very soft spoken and he even clarifies over phone as well. Such a calm and very professional Dr. Thank you DR for your patience. \nFeed back given based on my Baby \"Smrithi\
Very experienced doctor. Encourage the relationship between mom and baby. **** ** ********* *** ******* very easy approachable
Experience was quite good...he is very friendly and explains the problem in detail....*** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** ****

Very good doctor and very friendly, do not prescribes unnecessary medicine.
 It is worth to consult him
Very very good. *** **** ************ ** ********** **** ** ********** Waiting time is minimal. Staff is friendly.
He is a very experienced doctor. He is confident and calm. Best pediatrician I have consulted so far

1) Very systematic and friendly approach. 
2) Consultation on appointment time without any delay.
3) Recovery in very less time.
********** my baby was on IV and great pain.  He suggested an antibiotic syrup which was difficult to find but it reduced stress on my baby and he is better and happy now.

Really great experience since two years I am consulting and nowhere I got speed recovery treatment but i found after consulting with Dr. sanjeev Reddy. 
I recommend Dr. Sanjerv is best.
